map.Model
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  map.Model.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Define the item that can be in a player or a room add 7 attributes for build 3, such as fired, thrown, attackable, eatable, drinkable, lockable, unlockable.

Version:
1.4
Author:
ho_gao
